meta.job_title: Assistant Manager of Patent Paralegals and Assistants

duties_responsibilities.duty: Recruiting, hiring, training, and assigning work to paralegals and assistants
Coaching and conducting evaluations with regard to paralegals' and assistants' job performance
Training paralegals and assistants with respect to rules and procedures through regular staff meetings
Managing day-to-day operations to ensure coverage of deadlines and to facilitate completion of job requirements
Maintaining a positive work environment within the department

education_certification.credential: 3-5 years of management and/or patent paralegal services
